name: EcoCase - Birch Fiber
short: Slim biodegradable phone case made from birch fiber.
description: A slim, protective phone case made from renewable birch fiber and compostable materials. Provides shock absorption and a non-slip matte finish. Ethically manufactured and fully recyclable.

name: ReCharge USB-C Cable
short: Durable braided cable made from recycled PET.
description: High-durability USB-C cable braided from recycled PET. Fast charging and reinforced connectors for extended life. Available in 1m and 2m lengths.

name: SolarPocket Powerbank
short: Compact powerbank with solar trickle-charge panel.
description: Compact powerbank with integrated solar panel for emergency trickle charging. 5000mAh capacity, LED charge indicator, and eco-friendly casing made from bamboo composite.

name: PlantGuard Screen Protector
short: Biodegradable tempered protector with oleo-phobic coating.
description: Tempered screen protector with biodegradable film backing and oleo-phobic coating to reduce fingerprints. Easy-install kit included.

name: SeedPack Bundle
short: Bundle: case + cable + screen protector. Plant a tree with each purchase.
description: Value bundle including an EcoCase, ReCharge cable, and PlantGuard screen protector. For every bundle sold we plant a tree through our partner reforestation program.

name: Bamboo Grip Pop
short: Phone grip made from sustainable bamboo.
description: Minimalist phone grip (pop-style) crafted from bamboo. Adhesive is replaceable and packaging is plastic-free.

name: EcoWrap Gift Box
short: Recyclable gift wrap for sustainable gifting.
description: Kraft-style recyclable gift wrap with seed-embedded ribbon option. Perfect for gifting accessories.

name: Recycled Leather Wallet Case
short: Slim wallet case using recycled leather materials.
description: Multi-functional wallet case made from recycled leather with card slots. Protective design while reducing waste.

name: FastCharge Wall Adapter
short: Energy-efficient wall adapter with smart IC.
description: Compact energy-efficient wall adapter with smart IC to reduce power draw when fully charged. Comes in recyclable box.

name: Canvas Carry Pouch
short: Small pouch made from organic cotton for cables & accessories.
description: Durable pouch for organising cables and small accessories. Made from organic cotton with natural dye.
